attributes.action: Ban ALL Muslim Extremist Marches Or Demos in the United Kingdom to Ban Islam4UK  Website and Group.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ban totally any muslim extremist marches or demonstartions in the united kingdom also to ban the islam4uk website and group from operating.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
